LOẠT PHIM CỦA NETFLIX

-Why do you have a picture of my mom? -I didn't know it was your mom.

♪ Blood and water ♪
Thanks.

Wat gebeurt er nu?
 Mijn collega's zijn nu bij haar.

vi: Fikile,

according to you, "adopted?"

can you hold off on telling her about, you know, Reece?

Alles is goed.
 Red je het wel?

Bọn em ổn cả.
 Anh sẽ ổn chứ?

en: To say the least.

Tahira's right. Did you look into it?

en: Yes?

Let's start brainstorming some high-profit, low-cost,

en: I don't think so.
